title: QSS completely removes Fiora's ultimate.
body:
Just got shafted in a 1v1 against a Riven that built this.

Not many people know about this strategy atm, but it is quite possibly the ultimate counter to a lategame Fiora aside from standing next to a wall. This will pretty much destroy her anytime she tries to split push and 1v1 and forces her to teamfight, which she is god-awful at, or try to proxy a lane to stall a siege.

I have never seen one item counter almost 90% of a champion's damage like nothing.

Oh wait. There's Zed....
